title: Fix hovering issues in overview stats on devlog list page
description: Fix UI hovering issues in the overview stats on the devlog list page. Current problems include: 1) No gap between stats when hovering due to negative margins, 2) Inconsistent height when hovering due to padding/margin conflicts, and 3) Inconsistent background color (green) when hovering on clicked stats.

notes.content:
Completed: Successfully fixed all three hover issues in OverviewStats component:

1. ✅ Fixed gap issue: Removed negative margins causing stats to overlap when hovering
2. ✅ Fixed height consistency: Added consistent padding (8px 12px) and transparent borders for layout stability  
3. ✅ Fixed color inconsistency: Unified color scheme using blue tones (#f0f0f0, #bae7ff) instead of green

**Technical changes made:**
- Updated `OverviewStats.module.css` with proper hover states
- Replaced problematic negative margins with consistent padding approach
- Added transparent borders to maintain consistent dimensions
- Implemented unified blue color scheme for active/hover states

**Validation completed:**
- Browser testing confirmed proper spacing between all stat filters
- Height consistency verified across different screen interactions
- Color scheme now consistently blue for both hover and active states
- Screenshot evidence captured showing resolved issues

The overview stats now provide a smooth, consistent user experience when filtering devlog entries.

context.businessContext: Better user experience and visual consistency in the devlog list interface
context.technicalContext: CSS improvements to the OverviewStats component to fix hover states and spacing
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent gap between stats when hovering
Consistent height for all stats when hovering
Consistent background color for hover states
No visual jumping or layout shifts on hover
